title: Training for Resolving Science Ethics Dilemmas in 3D Virtual Worlds

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: A process where in-service elementary teachers experience and explore solutions to science ethics cases they may encounter in actual classes within a 3D virtual world, emphasizing scientific communication skills through language education integration

learning_goals: In virtual simulation environments, learners can identify and analyze more than five science ethics dilemma cases
Collaborating with peer teachers, learners can visually construct and present solutions to ethical issues in 3D space
After simulation activities, learners can articulate ethical decision-making processes through reflective journaling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
